right.text: jazzy the implications of asking our opinion on which nintendo character is hotter are pretty straightforward.

left.text: so jazzy who is hotter; Sally Acorn, Rouge or Amy Rose?
I think I would be afraid of meeting a lot of zzters in real life...this is easily the most disturbed group of stoners/nerds /furries I've ever met...I guess that's part of the charm or something.
